revised_title: Vegetable Staticks: Experiments on Sap in Vegetables and Attempts to Analyze Air
tldr: The author, Stephen Hales, conducted experiments on the sap flow in plants and trees, measuring the moisture they absorb and release. He also attempted to analyze the air using various chymico-statical experiments. His work provided valuable insights into plant physiology and the properties of the atmosphere.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Physiology
